mapper.select: select algorithm.algorithm_id,parameter_scheme.scheme_id,parameter.parameter_id, scheme_name,scheme_description,scheme_remark,dataset_name, algorithm_name,parameter_name,parameter_value,dataset.dataset_id from parameter,parameter_scheme,parameter_scheme_value,algorithm,dataset where parameter.algorithm_id=parameter_scheme.algorithm_id and parameter_scheme_value.parameter_id=parameter.parameter_id and parameter_scheme_value.scheme_id=parameter_scheme.scheme_id and parameter.algorithm_id=algorithm.algorithm_id

select algorithm.algorithm_id,parameter_scheme.scheme_id,dataset_name, parameter.parameter_id,scheme_name,scheme_description,dataset.dataset_id, scheme_remark,algorithm_name,parameter_name,parameter_value,parameter_type from parameter,parameter_scheme,parameter_scheme_value,algorithm,dataset where parameter.algorithm_id=parameter_scheme.algorithm_id and parameter_scheme_value.parameter_id=parameter.parameter_id and parameter.algorithm_id=algorithm.algorithm_id and parameter_scheme.dataset_id=dataset.dataset_id and parameter_scheme_value.scheme_id=parameter_scheme.scheme_id and parameter_scheme.scheme_id=#{schemeId}
mapper.insert: insert into parameter_scheme (algorithm_id, scheme_name, scheme_description, scheme_remark, dataset_id) values ( #{algorithmId}, #{schemeName}, #{schemeDescription}, #{schemeRemark}, #{datasetId} )
mapper.update: update parameter_scheme set scheme_name = #{schemeName}, scheme_description = #{schemeDescription}, scheme_remark = #{schemeRemark}, dataset_id = #{datasetId} where scheme_id = #{schemeId}

choose.when: insert into parameter_scheme_value (scheme_id, parameter_id, parameter_value) values (#{schemeId},#{item.parameterId},'NO');
insert into parameter_scheme_value (scheme_id, parameter_id, parameter_value) values (#{schemeId},#{item.parameterId},0);
choose.otherwise: insert into parameter_scheme_value (scheme_id, parameter_id, parameter_value) values (#{schemeId},#{item.parameterId},0);
